Les Karites Shea Butter Shampoo Deep Moisturizing 400 ml
SUNSILK Collagen Blends sulfate free Shampoo, Moisture Bomb with Collagen & Hyaluronic acid, for instant hydration & frizz control, 350ml
aboutThisItem: SUNSILK Collagen Blends Moisture Bomb Shampoo brings the rejuvenating power of collagen from skincare to deeply hydrate dry, damaged hair.
When paired with the conditioner, it provides intense moisture, revitalizing tired strands and leaving you with bouncy, naturally flowing hair.
Infused with collagen and hyaluronic acid, its ultra-hydrating formula penetrates deep into the hair shaft for long-lasting hydration.
Free from sulfates and silicones, it offers a gentle, natural hair care experience. For even more hair repair, use with Sunsilk Collagen Blends Moisture Bomb Super Conditioner & Mask.
Sunsilk is proud to be cruelty-free and PETA-approved.

hair care.title: Vatika Naturals Repair and Restore Shampoo (360mL) + 15% OFF | Natural Extracts with Honey and Egg | Repairs and Revitalizes Damaged and Split Hair
aboutThisItem: ENRICHED BOTANICALS: Expertly crafted with natural extracts of honey and egg, this herbal blend deeply repairs and revitalizes your hair from root to tip.
POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Egg, a rich source of protein, strengthens and nourishes hair, while honey locks in essential moisture to keep strands soft and hydrated.
HEALTHIER, STRONGER HAIR: Packed with vitamins A, E, biotin, and folate, egg helps maintain thick, healthy hair. It also replenishes moisture for smooth, shiny strands.
MULTIPLE BENEFITS: Enriched with Vatika Oils, honey supports cell growth, moisture retention, and nutrient restoration. The shampoo also reduces split ends for fuller, healthier-looking hair.
DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Apply to wet hair and scalp, gently massaging with fingertips to create a lather. Rinse thoroughly. Vatika works to repair and strengthen for visibly healthier hair.

hair care.title: Vatika Naturals Volume & Thickness Shampoo 600 ml | Natural Extracts of Coconut & Cactus | For Normal Thin & Limp Hair
aboutThisItem: NATURAL INGREDIENTS: Infused with coconut, cactus, and other nourishing Vatika oils, this herbal formula deeply nourishes from root to tip and helps reduce hair fall.
BENEFITS OF COCONUT: Easily absorbed into the hair shaft, coconut oil strengthens and repairs, enhancing your hair's natural resilience and elasticity.
NATURAL SOLUTION FOR HAIR THINNING: A potent blend of coconut, cactus, and botanical ingredients works to boost volume and promote thicker-looking hair.
MULTIPLE ADVANTAGES: Rich in natural extracts and vital nutrients, this formula strengthens hair and helps reduce thinning caused by breakage—free from parabens and harsh chemicals.
HOW TO USE: Gently massage into wet hair and scalp using your fingertips. Lather evenly and rinse thoroughly. Vatika provides deep nourishment, leaving your hair softer and shinier.

aboutThisItem: Provides up to 100% dandruff protection (visible flakes from a 2-foot distance with regular use). Head & Shoulders Smooth & Silky Anti-Dandruff Shampoo is designed for normal to dry hair, including colored or chemically treated hair.

Recognized as the world’s #1 shampoo (based on P&G’s calculation using Nielsen sales data from July 2015 to June 2016).
